title: International Wild Card All-Stars - Melbourne 26-29 Nov - Q&A

embed.description: Live in Melbourne The roar of the crowd fills the stadium as two teams take the stage. The cheering is only rivalled by the sound of thousands of thundersticks bashing together in support of the home team. It can only be one thing - a live esports event.

body:
Hey guys, if you have any questions on the up and coming IWCA event in Melbs just throw them up here and I will answer as best I can! 

GG All!

replies.body: Tickets?
On sale Monday at 11am.

Hi, GeneralCoxy,

I was lucky enough to be able to fly to Sydney from Adelaide to attend OPL Finals, last month.

As much as I would love to attend this live Riot event, having seen how awesome the last one was. I am unable to take time off work this time.

For the local Hoyts Viewing parties, is the show bag contents the same as at the live event?

Cheers,

Hey, we are working through the show bags at the moment so I will be able to update you soon. Glad you had a great time at the OPL Final we had such a great day hanging out with you all and seeing the final!
From the information so far, there are only tickets for the 28th and 29th. But there are also games before on the 26th and 27th, how will that work?

Hey, so we will be broadcasting live from the arena to Twitch and You Tube on the Thursday and Friday with the live audience events on the Saturday and Sunday. So you can watch from home on Thursday and Friday and then come to the venue for the weekend, or drop into a viewing party on the Sunday. Hope this helps.
so there is no event for the first two days?, im flying to melb to watch live, if im there on the thursday friday there wont be anything going on until the sat?

> [{quoted}](name=Decarnia,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=R97lKhpN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-04T01:36:57.384+0000)
>
> From the information so far, there are only tickets for the 28th and 29th. But there are also games before on the 26th and 27th, how will that work?

Hi, the games on Thursday and Friday will be streamed on Twitch and You Tube.
Hey, just wondering will there be places to buy food inside the venue? And what are we allowed to bring inside?
Yes there are multiple burger bars etc. there will be bag searches on the way in and I will check what you are allowed to bring in eg a packed lunch etc.

Is there any possibility of an event in the future that would be held in the less populous states, such as in Adelaide or Perth? Furthermore, what is the format likely to be for the 1v1 tournament, and will we be shown all of the games? Are the champions limited in the 1v1, or would it be a blind nemesis draft game (which I personally think would be really cool and also really fair)? Looking forward to going to the Hoyts Viewing Party in Perth.
Thanks,
og1764

Hey, I am not an expert on the format questions and I will get one of the other team to answer that. In terms of will all the games be shown. In regards to the Sunday and the viewing parties yes, you will see the entire day. For the broadcasts we will be showing everything! They are long days packed with esports goodness!
HI, was just wondering, why aren't there tickets available on the 26th and 27th. If this question has already been answered, link it to me and thanks to whoever answers.

Hi,
I bought my ticket few days ago, but unfortunately I won't be able to get there in time. I  didn't realize that before buying the ticket. So, is there any possible way to refund my ticket?
Thanks
Will the skins be the same at Pax Aus 2015?
Yep skins will be different for both days.
So I know if I attend both Saturday and Sunday I am guaranteed a show bag for each but will each day have a different show bag so I don't end up doubling up on the same goodies?
Hey sorry for the late reply. Contents are different for both days.

Me and my friend are going in, but my mum is going to be waiting for us. Is there anywhere around Margaret Court she can go to while were in? Shopping centre, something like that etc. 

Thanks :D
If u can go for a quick drive Crown casino is nearby which is the biggest Casino in the southern hemisphere
Will there be merch on sale at the venue in Melbourne?
We are still working on this and we hope to have an update soon, but it is our aim to have merch at All-Stars.
I hope there is merch. Being 17 sucks especially not having a Visa card. So hopefully there is
Hey, confirmed we will have merchandise at MCA, and cash is acceptable :) Go crazy!
Yeah totally understand, I hope we can get merchandise there for you!
Brilliant, thank you.
would the show bags be something similar to the kunar park one? like same skin for astro naut and forsaken jayce?
Hi, skins will be totally different to the OPL Final at Luna Park.
Is seating allocated in the venue? Or is it just go wherever?
allocated e.g Section: 12 aisle: LOW row: F Seat: 111
Yeah if you jump on the site you can choose the exact seat you want in the relevant section.
just wondering what is the age limit for this event?
There is no age limit as the event is not licensed.
sweet thanks so im 16 and i can go?
Yes you can :)

Hey, just wondering if the seats at the extreme right hand side of the stage is good (distance, lightening, obstruction)?  We ordered the tickets immediately at 11 and the automatic allocation put us there so it was beyond our control.  I have a couple of our friends who have bad vision and may feel disorientated.  They are just wondering if it is still possible to see the stage and have the most comfortable experience.

Hi, the ticket site allows you to choose your section and seat so it would not have allocated you automatically (see attached image). On the right we will have screens facing those sections. If you are worried I would call the venue and ask if you could be moved, they will do their best to help you based on your requirements. Don't leave it too long to call the box office as there are still seats to allow you to swap.  Hope this helps.

> [{quoted}](name=GeneralCoxy,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=R97lKhpN,comment-id=00170000,timestamp=2015-09-07T10:59:42.178+0000)
>
> Hi, the ticket site allows you to choose your section and seat so it would not have allocated you automatically (see attached image). On the right we will have screens facing those sections. If you are worried I would call the venue and ask if you could be moved, they will do their best to help you based on your requirements. Don't leave it too long to call the box office as there are still seats to allow you to swap.  Hope this helps.

Thanks for the swift reply, I will call them up first thing in the morning to see what they can do.  I must have not noticed that my seats were allocated there haha
No worries give them a call and they will help you out :)

> [{quoted}](name=GeneralCoxy,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=R97lKhpN,comment-id=0017000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-07T23:41:29.822+0000)
>
> No worries give them a call and they will help you out :)

I called them up before and they said this event is not exchangeable/refundable.  Hopefully we can still see the stage and screen from the side. Thanks for the help GeneralCoxy though :D
Cool sorry they were not more helpful. I think you will be fine as we have side facing screens also.
Hey guys. Will we be take food to the event?
I am checking this for you at the moment, stand by for an answer soon.
Thank you!!

Hey, so yes you can bring your own food and drink in - Food is fine and drinks fine too providing thee container adheres with our conditions of entry.
http://www.margaretcourtarena.com.au/arriving-and-access/conditions-of-entry/)

Kinda disappointed that the website tells us the tickets are $25 including the booking fee and charges, only to get charged an extra .95 on each ticket and a $5.50 "booking fee". if I didn't have friends relying on me to purchase their tickets, I wouldn't have bought after being misled like that.
Hi. Sorry this is the Ticketek delivery fee and is out of our control. I will make sure we clearly call this out and this was done to miss lead you in any way.

> [{quoted}](name=GeneralCoxy,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=R97lKhpN,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2015-09-07T01:34:16.984+0000)
>
> Hi. Sorry this is the Ticketek delivery fee and is out of our control. I will make sure we clearly call this out and this was done to miss lead you in any way.

Really appreciate that you immediately updated the site to reflect the fee. Glad to see it was unintentional. =)
Cool no worries, caught us off guard that one, hope you have an awesome time at All Stars!
How come you guys aren't having an audience on the first two days? Because I feel like you guys would sell out on both days
